Name: Armorik the Viking: The Eight Conquests
About the game: Armorik is a young, courageous and ambitious Viking. With your help and that of Thor, he will try to conquer the eight territories that will allow him to become a legend. Attacked by Trolls, demons and other deformed beings, it will take all your cunning and skill to cross the eight difficulty levels. A fast paced arcade game.
